name: Gabenwood: 99 Hidden Bucks
description:
Conducting some treacherous experiments, the evil Scientist threw bucks to the black hole in the center of the Universe. This created the anomaly which can destroy our world and all parallel universes.
Save the Universe from destruction. Go to the black-and-white locations of the Gabenwoods and find all bucks there.
Be cautions, and find all symbols «$» in the game.

Disclaimer:
The story, all names, characters, and incidents portrayed in this game are fictitious. No identification with actual persons (living or deceased), places, buildings, and products is intended or should be inferred.

Features:
* Hidden objects puzzle.
* Simple control by mouse.
* Relaxing gameplay.
* Funny, hand-drawn, black-and-white locations.
* The game is suited for all ages.
* Achievements.
